dc:title: On Pilgrimage - December 1965
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Discusses freedom of conscience and obedience to Church and State in the context of Vatican Council II's condemnation of nuclear war. Lauds the "little way" of St. Therese as the foundation of world peace and a means of social change.
